author: .vbuterin
content: BTW one other reason why I support this direction is that it can be extended to include bulletproof commitment containers, and if we do that then we could incorporate the verkle tree state in the spec. That would let us actually properly have the execution state be "part of the spec" the same way that consensus state is, instead of appealing to some outside engine to do state execution
